markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Primal Roar](/Actions.aspx?ID=763) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Eidolon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=386" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 61 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your eidolon unleashes a primal roar or other such terrifying noise that fits your eidolon's form. Your eidolon attempts [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) checks to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) each enemy that can hear the roar; these Demoralize attempts don't take any penalty for not sharing a language.
name: Primal Roar
